metadata.name: TCS01-HKStadium
metadata.description: The Hong Kong Stadium is the main sports venue of Hong Kong. Redeveloped from the old Government Stadium, it reopened as Hong Kong Stadium in March 1994. A myriad of events have been held in this stadium including:  the Hong Kong Scout Rally, Soaring Eagles Celebrate Reunification, Cathay Pacific/HSBC Hong Kong Sevens, Welcoming the Delegation of Shenzhou-6 Manned Space Flight Mission Variety Show, Football event of the East Asian Games etc. The stadium's multi-purpose recreational usage renders it the largest outdoor sports venue in Hong Kong. The NFT artwork serves the purpose of preserving its architectural signifcance to the Asian Community
